News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Gets Credit Rating Reaffirmed
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries receives IVR BBB Stable credit rating reaffirmation from Infomerics for long-term bank facilities, maintaining stable outlook for the steel manufacturer.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Reports January 2026 Sales Update
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries Limited announced sales of 20,277.64 MT for January 2026 under regulatory compliance requirements, marking a significant monthly performance update.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Pays ₹1.53L NSE Fine for Delayed Results
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries board acknowledges NSE fine of ₹1,53,400 for delayed submission of half-yearly results ended September 30, 2025, citing technical portal issues despite timely compliance.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Redeems ₹2 Cr Preference Shares
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries Limited has redeemed ₹2 crores worth of unlisted preference shares as part of the seventh tranche redemption to Escort Finvest Private Limited.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Reports 26.42% Q3 Sales Growth
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries achieved 53,083.41 MT sales volume in Q3 FY26, marking 26.42% growth over Q2. December 2025 sales reached 20,142.57 MT with 13.52% monthly growth.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports November 2025 Sales of 17,742 MT
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries Limited announced its sales volume for November 2025 reached 17,742 MT (metric tons). The company disclosed this business update to stock exchanges BSE and NSE as part of its regulatory compliance requirements.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports Quarterly Financial Results with Mixed Performance
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries Limited announced its standalone and consolidated unaudited financial results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025, showing revenue from operations of Rs. 15,686.56 lakhs for the quarter. The company's Board of Directors approved the results during their meeting held on November 13, 2025, with statutory auditors providing limited review reports without modifications.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports October Sales of 15,198.33 Metric Tons
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries announced its October sales volume of 15,198.33 metric tons. The company disclosed this monthly sales figure as part of its operational updates.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports 55% Month-on-Month Sales Growth
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries recorded sales of 17,454.4 metric tons in September, compared to 11,243.4 metric tons in the previous month, representing a month-on-month increase of approximately 55.24%.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports 55% Month-Over-Month Sales Growth in September
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries reported September sales of 17,454.4 metric tons, representing a 55.24% increase from the previous month's sales of 11,243.4 metric tons. The steel company demonstrated significant monthly growth in its sales volume.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reappoints Rajesh Agrawal as Managing Director for Five Years
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries Limited shareholders approved the reappointment of Rajesh Agrawal as Managing Director for a five-year term from October 1, 2025 to September 30, 2030 at their 37th Annual General Meeting. Agrawal, aged 53 with a Bachelor of Commerce degree, brings over 35 years of experience in steel manufacturing, production, marketing, and administrative work. The company also appointed Nitesh Jain as Secretarial Auditor for five consecutive financial years from April 1, 2025 to March 31, 2030. Jain is a practicing company secretary with experience in secretarial audits. Agrawal is related to company director Mrs. Rekha Agrawal and has not been debarred from holding directorship by any regulatory authority.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports ₹1.74 Crore Net Profit on ₹207.12 Crore Revenue for Quarter Ended June 30, 2025
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries Limited published unaudited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. The steel manufacturing company reported consolidated total income of ₹207.12 crore with net profit after tax of ₹1.74 crore. On standalone basis, the company achieved net profit after tax of ₹1.67 crore. Key metrics include equity share capital of ₹16.95 crore and earnings per share of ₹1.01. The consolidated net profit after tax improved from ₹0.87 crore in the previous quarter, while total income remained flat at ₹207.12 crore compared to Q4 FY2025. The company is listed on BSE with scrip code 513554 and NSE under symbol MAHASTEEL.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports 112% Jump in Q1 Net Profit
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries reported a net profit of 17 million rupees in Q1, representing a significant increase from 8 million rupees in the same period last year. The company's revenue also grew to 2.1 billion rupees compared to 2 billion rupees year-over-year, marking steady growth across both profitability and top-line performance.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports July 2025 Sales of 13,290.350 MT
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries announced its sales figures for July 2025, reporting 13,290.350 MT in sales units. The company provided this monthly business update to stock exchanges NSE and BSE. The announcement was signed by Company Secretary Jaswinder Kaur Mission.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports Improved Q4 EBITDA
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries has reported its quarterly results. The company's EBITDA for Q4 increased to 77 million rupees, up from 33 million rupees in the same quarter of the previous year. The EBITDA margin also improved, rising to 3.27% from 1.69% year-over-year.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports Q4 Financial Results
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries has reported its Q4 financial results. The company's net profit for the quarter was 42 million rupees, compared to 9.6 million rupees in the same quarter last year (YoY) and 10 million rupees in the previous quarter (QoQ). The company's revenue for Q4 was 2.4 billion rupees, up from 1.97 billion rupees in the same quarter last year.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports April 2025 Sales
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries has announced its sales figures for April 2025, reporting a total of 16,669.390 metric tons sold during the month.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports April 2025 Sales
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries has announced its sales figures for April 2025, reporting a total of 16,669.390 metric tons sold during the month.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Reports 19.30% Quarterly Sales Growth
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel has announced a significant increase in its quarterly sales, reaching 51,381.060 MT in March 2025. This represents a 19.30% growth compared to the previous quarter, indicating strong performance and market demand for the company's products.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Reports December 2024 Sales Figures
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel has reported sales of 16,676.540 metric tons for the month of December 2024.

News.Title: Mahamaya Steel Industries Reports September 2024 Sales
News.Summary: Mahamaya Steel Industries has announced its sales figures for September 2024. The company reported sales of 11,466.045 metric tons for the month.
